attributes.action: force MP's to stand for re-election if they defect from a party to another
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While it is understandable that MP's over time change there loyalties, it is not acceptable that a MP can change sides and cheat the electorate of there votes. Any member defecting must stand for re-election or resign from Parliament any thing less would be a lie and a cheat to the voters.
